thread.title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Japan’s Hot Economy, Spendy Tourists, Cool Airport Hotels

author: WSJ Staff
title: WSJ Wealth Adviser Briefing: Japan’s Hot Economy, Spendy Tourists, Cool Airport Hotels
text: The soft patch in the global economy is looking more soft and less like a patch, writes Richard Barley. Instead of playing catch-up to positive economic surprises as they did throughout 2017, investors are being wrong-footed by weaker than expected data. Below, some of the best analysis and insight from WSJ writers and columnists, and WSJ City: Why Italy's Economy Risks a Spiral of Decline, What to Know About GDPR Next Oil Falls as Producers Ponder Boosting Output—Energy Journal
